servinfo.title: Air intake Pipe Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Intercooler and Air Intake Pipe Components:F9Q

attention2.ptxt: When replacing inlet throttle valve, initialize inlet throttle valve data referring to Inlet Throttle Valve Data Initialization:F9Q .

s1.ptxt: Disconnect boost pressure sensor connector (1) and inlet throttle valve connector (2).
Disconnect intercooler outlet pipe (3) from air intake pipe (5) as follows.

s2.ptxt: Remove Intercooler pipe bracket No.2 (9) as follows.

s3.ptxt: Remove intercooler pipe bracket No.2 bolt (7).
Remove bolt (8) and remove intercooler pipe bracket No.2.

s2.ptxt: Disconnect intercooler outlet pipe from air intake pipe.

s1.ptxt: Remove vacuum pipe (4) and air intake pipe.
Remove inlet throttle valve referring to Intercooler and Air Intake Pipe Components:F9Q if necessary

item.ptxt: Do not apply any lubricant to hose and pipe when connecting.

Be sure to connect each hose and pipe properly according to the following procedure. Failure to follow the procedure causes accidental hose disconnection and damage to exhaust system, especially diesel particulate filter.

s1.ptxt: Install vacuum pipe and air intake pipe.

torqueitem.t-part: Air intake pipe bolt and nut

s1.ptxt: Connect intercooler outlet pipe to air intake pipe as follows.

s2.ptxt: Connect intercooler outlet pipe (3) to air intake pipe.
Install intercooler pipe bracket No.2 (7) and tighten intercooler pipe bracket bolt No.1 (6) by hand.
Tighten intercooler pipe bracket bolt No.2 (5) and intercooler outlet pipe bolt (8).
Tighten intercooler outlet pipe clamp (4) as follows.

attention2.ptxt: Be sure to locate clamp bolt in a direction of vehicle forward.

s3.ptxt: Tighten clamp to 5.0 N·m (0.51 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft).
Leave clamp for five minutes as it is.
After five minutes, tighten clamp to 5.0 N·m (0.51 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft).

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 5.0 N·m (0.51 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft), and then tighten 5.0 N·m (0.51 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft) after 5 minutes.

s2.ptxt: Tighten intercooler pipe bracket bolt No.1 (6).

s1.ptxt: Connect boost pressure sensor connector (1) and inlet throttle valve connector (2).
